name: ezaMaze
description:
ezaMaze is an open source procedural maze generator.

Roll your way through the two sided maze and navigate your way through shifting tides of gravity. 

Each level is larger than the last, and the end is indefinite.

The source code can be accessed below. It is MIT licensed, so feel free to modify, reproduce, and copy freely without any credit or attribution. 

https://bitbucket.org/stenixon/finalproject/
